info.description: This API provides the Plena Global Holdings software development team with the necessary knowledge base for the integration of the different applications with the services offered by the Maintenance Department.
info.title: MAINTENANCE & ENVIROMENTAL DEPARTMENT API

ccn_auxiliary_staff.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

ccn_order.description: Integer number that identifies the work order associated with the maintenance of a fixed asset within the database (*) mandatory, Once the order is created, the record in this table will be automatically set with CCN 10000, which allows leaving the field free if the created order does not require other team members to process it.

technical_two.description: Integer number that identifies the work order associated with the maintenance of a fixed asset within the database (*) mandatory, Once the order is created, the record in this table will be automatically set with CCN 10000, which allows leaving the field free if the created order does not require other team members to process it.

technical_three.description: Integer number that identifies the work order associated with the maintenance of a fixed asset within the database (*) mandatory, Once the order is created, the record in this table will be automatically set with CCN 10000, which allows leaving the field free if the created order does not require other team members to process it.

technical_four.description: Integer number that identifies the work order associated with the maintenance of a fixed asset within the database (*) mandatory, Once the order is created, the record in this table will be automatically set with CCN 10000, which allows leaving the field free if the created order does not require other team members to process it.

technical_five.description: Integer number that corresponds to the unique consecutive numerical code (CCN) of an employee within the database. It allows to associate up to 5 maintenance team members to manage the associated order. (*) mandatory

ccn_auxiliary_staff_go.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

ccn_generic_order.description: Integer number that identifies the work order associated with the generic order within the database (*) mandatory, Once the order is created, the record in this table will be automatically set with CCN 10000, which allows leaving the field free if the created order does not require other team members to process it.

technical_two.description: Integer number that identifies the work order associated with the generic order within the database (*) mandatory, Once the order is created, the record in this table will be automatically set with CCN 10000, which allows leaving the field free if the created order does not require other team members to process it.

technical_five.description: Integer number that corresponds to the unique consecutive numerical code (CCN) of an employee within the database. It allows to associate up to 5 maintenance team members to manage the associated order. (*) mandatory
